website_summaries.verdict: A sound alternative to leather at a reasonable price.
pros: Features similar to those of costlier models
A tough belt with a one-year warranty
cons: Material is somewhat stiff at first

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & adjustable, missing a few small organizer pockets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool belt for general home use. It is comfortable and has useful pockets for hauling hand tools. It's easy to add a drill holster or move pockets as all of the pockets are sleeved and slide freely on the belt. The only ding against this otherwise functional belt is that I wish it had an organizer panel for small items like a nail punch, drill bits, carpenter's pencils, etc.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure everyone has different needs for their toolbelt but I love this one for doing miscellaneous house projects (installing curtains, light plumbing and electrical work, etc.). I’ve had it well over a year and no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lilheart17

customer_reviews.title: and this one was great. You can remove and place the pouches where ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this belt for work as a field service rep. I needed something with a quick release, and this one was great. You can remove and place the pouches where you need them. Only down side was when removing belt with tools still inside the pouches would slide, some sort of lock for the pouches would've been perfect but other then that it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: John Cruz

customer_reviews.title: The TR 88021 12 has large pockets good for screws and nails but nothing else
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace a 47 year-old leather work belt. After one day -- THAT IS ONE DAY -- I went back to my old leather belt. The TR 88021 12 has large pockets good for screws and nails but nothing else. There are no adornments for pencils, screwdrivers, or any other tools. Belt is a VERY poorly designed product.
customer_reviews.author: F. Douglas Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great for construction work!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this belt at work everyday for about four months now and couldn't be happier with it! So far it has held up admirably in a construction environment. Not one hole or tear. The fit is comfortable, but also doesn't sag. The belt length is plenty long enough. I've added an extra pouch for more pockets without a problem. Great product, greater value!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good belt
customer_reviews.text: I am a finish carpenter. I am 5'6" and 145lbs. I use this belt every day and it works well for me. I did swap out one of the pouches that comes on here with one that holds my drill/driver. If this belt came with that already on it I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool belt! the price is great and the product is even better! I got this for my fiance and i think i will order another one just for me! My dad owns a construction company so I've see a hand full of different tool belts. This belt has a laston material and compares to any tool blet buy without the price tag attached to it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: MaryKat

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and looked at nearly every belt on Amazon, but decided to give this one a try. Boy am I glad I did!! I was concerned about the picture that was shown for this item, as it looked very cheaply made, but I was wrong. This thing is built to take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: So necessary
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the weekend warrior DIYer like me. It's wonderful not having to use pant pockets and mouth to hold parts, or to hold tools in between legs while at the top of the ladder while using my hands on something else. Great price, too.
customer_reviews.author: differentflies

customer_reviews.title: A lot of pockets for all your tools!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty clips that keep the belt secured. Also very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Deepan

customer_reviews.title: Should've bought one ten years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, canvas is way more flexible than leather, and more weather resistant. Better quality overall than the cheap leather tool belts. Good value for price. Like having your workbench right there with you. As a DIY homeowner, I can't believe it took me so long to simply buy one of these. Saves so much time and so many steps!
customer_reviews.author: Bearsnare

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it is well made
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it is well made. I like that the pockets are removable from the belt so I can change them for other pockets like a drill holster of other type pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Opio

customer_reviews.title: I really can't compare other tool belts since this is ...
customer_reviews.text: I really can't compare other tool belts since this is my first, but I would have to say that I've had no issues with it. I carry minimum tools and this tool belt does the job. I don't even use all the pockets. It feels very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael DragonTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: hammer falls in easy, stanly fat max measuring tape slips on and ...
customer_reviews.text: havent used it much but, hammer falls in easy, stanly fat max measuring tape slips on and off amazing. largest pockets fit a square or drills. i wear a mens 30 waist and had to cinch the belt way down, still a great load bearing fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product just wish they mentioned the size of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product just wish they mentioned the size of the belt as it is a bit big for me. Guess I'll just have to grow into it :D
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: great tool belt
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool belt for the DIY homeowner. Plenty of pockets for nails/screws etc.
customer_reviews.author: bahbo

customer_reviews.title: DIY Win
customer_reviews.text: Great belt for the money. Not something I would suggest for a professional but as a DIYer it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Werminator

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, not to large or too small. I have plenty of room and extremely well made! Love love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this belt
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and there is space for everything i need to IT and low voltage work. The material very strong
customer_reviews.author: Tom H

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strong easy to use, front and back side of you,but no places to put pencil and screwdrivers
customer_reviews.author: ariel

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $
customer_reviews.text: This drone flew away and we couldn't find it. Waste of $!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great tool belt for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have always preferred nylon tool belts to leather ones. I got this belt For a discount/free for my honest review and have been very satisfied with it, it had spots, clips, pouches, hangers, etc. for everything you could imagine. It is easy to customize and put the pouches, hanger and clips. I wish it had shoulder harness attachment points so when you load it up, you can take the pressure off your back and keep the belt up when climbing ladders or scaffolding. My last tool belt was similar to this one but it cost me twice the price so I considered this one a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Keller

customer_reviews.title: It looks fine to me
customer_reviews.text: It looks fine to me, but it's for my grandson's birthday next week & he picked out what he would like, so I am sure he will be happy with the tool belt.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great overall
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as pictured seems very sturdy so far has a place for all my tools!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee R.

product_meta.title: TR Industrial 88021 12 Multi-Function Belt Tool Holder
product_meta.description: Keep your tools and accessories around your waist to keep your hands free when working. This belt contains 12 functional holsters/pockets to hold cordless drills, hammers, measuring tape, screwdrivers, and more. The belt is built with durable materials and the strap is just under 2 inches. It also includes a 1-Year warranty.
feature_bullets: Keep your tools and accessories around your waist to keep your hands free when working
12 functional holsters/pockets for items such as hammers, measuring tape, screwdrivers, and more
Belt strap is just under 2 inches in height

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars58 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
